paragraph.value: As can be seen from Table 3, our models produce
scores than almost all the comparisons. Especially, our models with separate decoder yield
scores than all seq2seq-based models (approximation randomization testing, p < 0.0001) do.

scores are achieved by the RETRIEVAL baseline, mainly due to its significantly longer arguments. Moreover, utilizing attention over both input and the generated keyphrases further boosts our models' performance. Interestingly, utilizing system retrieved evidence yields

scores than using oracle retrieval for testing.
